text: Xinshimen shuo:“Weisheme meiyou jiang shi yi zhang [“gulanjing”] jing wen [gei women] ne?” Danshi, dang yi zhang mingshi de jing wen jiang shi, qizhong ti dao shengzhan [ding wei zhuming] shi, ni jiang kanjian xinzhong you bing zhe [wei xinzhe] yi lin si shi hun yun zhe de yanguang kanzhe ni, zhe dui tamen [wei xinzhe] shi zui hao de,[yibian tamen fucong an la].
